text: allh- subhanah wteala- hu aldhy yaqbid al'anfus hin mwtha, whdhh alwafat alkbra, wafat almawt banqda' alajl, wyqbd alty lam tamut fi mnamha, wahi almawtat alsghra, fyhbs min hatayn alnfsyn alnafs alati qadaa ealayha almwt, wahi nfs man mat, wayursil alnafs al'ukhraa 'iilaa aistikmal 'ajalaha wrzqha, wdhlk b'ieadtha 'iilaa jism sahbha, 'iina fi qubid allah nfs almayit walnaym w'irsalh nfs alnaym, whbsh nfs almayit ladlayl wadihatan ealaa qudrat allah liman tufakir wtdbr
